timeline.message:
Fix a couple of tests that were failing randomly. (#7739) (#8525)

Co-authored-by: Manuel Carrasco Moñino <manolo@vaadin.com>

Retain binary compatibility for listenOn method (#8540)

* Retain binary compatibility for listenOn method

Adding support for listening for shortcuts on multiple components #7339 broke binary compatibility.
This is problematic for any addon that would now need a new release on top of Flow 2.2.
Fixed the weirdly formulated javadocs.

Fixes vaadin/vaadin-button-flow#162

Prevent NPE in Pwa handler (#8561) (#8569)

Fixes #8560

remove terser plugin from the default dependencies (#8503)

Fixes vaadin/platform#1251
# Conflicts:
#	flow-server/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/frontend/NodeUpdater.java
#	flow-server/src/test/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/frontend/NodeUpdaterTest.java

Do not create buildFolder in dev mode (#7969)

In development mode we do not use
the build folder, but creating it on
runtime may make for instance Jetty
restart due to changes in scanned packages.

Fixes #7922

Properly encoded URIs use %20 (#8271)

fixes #5360
# Conflicts:
#	flow-tests/test-root-context/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/uitest/ui/StreamResourceView.java
#	flow-tests/test-root-context/src/test/java/com/vaadin/flow/uitest/ui/StreamResourceIT.java

Add peer dependency forcing mechanism to VersionsJsonFilter (#8545)

* Update VersionJsonConverter to use forced dependencies

* Update VersionJsonConverterTest

Change VersionJsonConverterTest in order to accomodate new behaviour when filtering versions

Fix duplicate event listeners in TemplateRenderer (#8428)

in case where the element is attached several times during the same roundtrip.
Fix memory leak by removing detach listener when called.

Fixes vaadin/vaadin-grid-flow#837

Don't redirect in case of error in web component mode (#8539)

Fixes #8101

Don't handle dynamic resources by the DevModeHandler (#8547)

Fixes #8500
# Conflicts:
#	flow-server/src/main/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/DevModeHandler.java
#	flow-server/src/test/java/com/vaadin/flow/server/DevModeHandlerTest.java
#	flow-tests/test-root-context/src/test/java/com/vaadin/flow/uitest/ui/StreamResourceIT.java

Prevent StackOverflowError in Composite. (#8529)

Fixes #5553

# Conflicts:
#	flow-server/src/test/java/com/vaadin/flow/component/CompositeTest.java
Update slf4j version to resolve vulnerabilities (#8566)

Add client side API for listening DOM Node set for StateNode (#8590) (#8596)

Part of vaadin/multiplatform-runtime#72

timeline.author: vaadin-bot
